name: Goro Takemura
description: Goro Takemura(Japanese: 竹村 五郎,Hepburn:Takemura Goro) is the former personal bodyguard ofSaburo Arasaka.He is a stoic man of honor and fiercely loyal toArasaka, but finds himself betrayed and out of his element inNight City. Goro Takemura was born in the slums ofChiba-11, the district with the highest murder rate in all ofJapan. It's unknown what became of his mother; as his father worked full-time in a kitchen, Goro's grandmother used to tell him stories about yōkai. Arasakamilitary transporters would occasionally pass through Chiba-11, picking children from the district to conscript into...
